description: Hazuki Izuna is an apprentice Itako who left her Itako training midway to come to Tokyo to seek fame and fortune. She uses her spiritual powers (with the help of the kudagitsune that she rears and tames) to earn money as a fortune teller. Hot-tempered and over-confident, she tends to bite off more than she can chew, and often ends up needing to be bailed out by http://anidb.net/ch50253 [Nube]. She is a student at Doumori Middle School.
name: Hazuki Izuna
